text:
Question 11) The 21st century consumer, called a new social consumer, tends to behave differently from the traditional consumer. The association of the characteristics presented in the diagram, it is inferred that this new consumer is influenced by the
A) Culture of e -commerce.
B) Constant search for the lowest price.
C) disclosure of information by companies.
D) recurring need for consumption.
E) Posture common to traditional consumers.
